Changelog
=========


0.1 (2015-01-05)
----------------

- Add ``MANIFEST.in``.
  [WouterVH]

- Added ``z3c.autoinclude``-entrypoint to mark this as a Plone-plugin.
  This avoids the need to explicitly load the zcml-slug.
  [WouterVH]

- Initial implementation.
  [fschulze]

- Initial package structure.
  [zopeskel]
